scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run e2e:functional && npm run e2e:playwright:screenshots && npm run e2e:playwright:screenshots:percy && npm run e2e:playwright:screenshots:smartui && npm run e2e:selenium:screenshots && npm run e2e:selenium:screenshots:percy && npm run e2e:selenium:screenshots:smartui
scripts.e2e:playwright:screenshots:smartui: export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | xargs) && cd e2e && USE_SMARTUI=true jest specs/playwright_screenshot_tests.js
scripts.e2e:playwright:screenshots:percy: export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | xargs) && cd e2e && USE_PERCY=true npx percy exec -- jest specs/playwright_screenshot_tests.js
scripts.e2e:selenium:screenshots:smartui: export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | xargs) && cd e2e && USE_SMARTUI=true jest specs/selenium_screenshot_tests.js
scripts.e2e:selenium:screenshots:percy: export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | xargs) && cd e2e && USE_PERCY=true npx percy exec -- jest specs/selenium_screenshot_tests.js
